conversations.content: Fasten that last pesky strap, and...done! I've truly outdone myself, I must say.
At long last, my darling and I can embark on a (swim)suitably steamy seaside tryst!
He's going to be smitten, charmed, AND enraptured, mark my words.
Mym, what say you we take a walk? Just the two of us. I want you in that swimsuit all to myself.
Oh, to dream. He would never say something like that.
I mean, sure, we've gotten closer, but...
You really know how to spoil a girl rotten, darling. I'm so happy to be spending time together like this.
My pleasure. After all, you always do so much for us.
What? Say, darling...how exactly do you feel about me?
I value you as a dear comrade, of course.
That's not what I mean! I'll ask you straight-out, then. Do you like me?
Of course I like you.
Oh, I just KNEW you did! That's why you're here on this date—
And Elisanne and Ranzal...and everyone in the Halidom. You're all wonderful people.
(AAARGH, that's NOT what I mean!)
My darling is even more thick-headed in romance than I am, and I'm a DRAGON.
Despite all I do to get his attention, it's like he's not even seeing me that way at all... Confidence...depleting...
Luckily for me, I've got a hydrodynamic trump card up my sleeve. He's going to do a TRIPLE-take when he sees this fit!
There's even a perfect event to set the mood happening on the beach. Jackpot.
Let's see. According to the pamphlet I got from the cafe...
＂At some point, crystals containing sea breeze mana took on the moniker of 'wishing crystals.'＂
＂These desire-granting crystals float in the air when wishes are made upon them.＂
Eeeee! So romantic!
OK, got that out of my system. I'm off to see my dar—
Heeeelp!
What's going on?
Eeeeek!
Take THIS!
Whew. You okay? ...Hey, wait, you're a faerie!
And you're...a dragon? I can't believe you saved me.
After that shriek of yours, how could I not?
I can't say I put ＂save a faerie in peril＂ on my bingo card for today. What brings you here?
First, let me say thank you. I've come to this beach to make a wishing crystal.
Oh, so we're here for the same reason. Didn't know faeries were into this too.
I created the event myself, so I would sure hope so.
Right, right, you created—wait, WHAT?!
Are you telling me this is all your doing?
More or less.
Even the floating crystals?
Those are replicas humans made with sea breeze crystals. They're just an imitation of the real ones that I create.
They only float because of the mana they're made with. You don't actually have to wish on them; you need only warm them in your hand a little, and off they go.
Well, that's one illusion officially shattered. *sigh* So much for my dream.
No need to be so despondent. I want to collect strong wishes, you see...
And the wishing crystal is something I originally made in order to amplify faerie power.
The more fervent the desire, the greater the resultant energy. I collect that in the crystals, and then make its power my own.
Ah. So that's why you put this event together—to bring supplicants in droves.
That's the idea. You're as sharp as you are strong.
You know what? I like you. You helped me out, so here. Let me give you a freshly made crystal as thanks.
Not necessary. I'm a dragon, so I don't have much use for a little trinket like that.
But weren't you just bemoaning the fact that you have a dream going unfulfilled?
True, nothing will happen if you make a wish on a replica crystal...
But the real deal? That actually WILL grant your heart's desire.
It...will?
That's right. Now here, don't be shy! Take the darn thing already.
I'll be in this cave for a while, so come let me know when your wish gets granted. Looking forward to the good news!
Hey, wait! Sheesh... What a pushy faerie.
Well, I've got my little magic ticket here, so I may as well make use of it. I wish...
...that my darling would have eyes only for me.
Huh?! The crystal disappeared!
There's no way it could've been that easy. ...Could it?
You know what, never mind. I have somewhere to be.
Aha, there they are. Hi, everyone! Sorry to keep you all waaaiting!
You certainly took your time Mym. The barbecue is already—ngh?!
Mym, run! Quickly! The sea is—
Huh?
Mym, watch out!
(Where'd a giant wave like this come from all of a sudden?! Ow ow ow...)
(Not good... Leg cramping... Can't breathe...)
Mym! MYM! Are you all right?!
Elisanne? What...happened to me?
That enormous wave crashed ashore and nearly drowned you. I'm so relieved you're okay.
I see. Thank you for saving—
Euden! Come on, man, wake up!
Wait. What's going on? Why is he...?
He ran into the water to save ya, and ended up goin' under too...
No... Darling! DARLING!
This is all my fault. I'm so sorry. Please, my love, open your eyes!
*cough* *splutter* Mym...?
Oh, what a relief! You're awake!
Are you all right, Euden?
Er, I'm fine, but... Um...
But what?
Sorry, uh... Who are you all again?
WHAT?!
So you're sayin' that other than your own and Mym's names, yer mind's a blank slate?
That seems to be the case... I'm sorry.
Perhaps this is his body's stress response to the trauma he just experienced.
The fact that he only remembers Mym could be because he was trying to help her just before he went under.
Uh, so what do we do about this, then? Are his memories gone for good?
I have an idea! There's a place pretty close to this beach where medicinal herbs grow. Maybe we'll find something helpful there.
Good thinking, Luca. I'll go with you to investigate.
Count me in too, people!
I'll go check with the nearby church and see if they're aware of any treatments for memory loss.
I'll assist with that. If we're gathering info, many hands make for lighter work.
Truth. I'll go see what info I can dig up in the port town.
In that case, I'll—
Mym, you stay with the prince. I think it'd be better if the both of you kept resting.
Plus, I think he'll feel better if he's with someone he actually remembers. We're countin' on you.
I'm sorry everyone has to go to all this trouble on my account.
Don't you waste another second worrying about that! The only thing you need to be doing is taking it easy.
Yeah... You're right.
(He looks so uneasy. Not that I blame him, what with his memories lost and all.)
(So long as he's incapacitated on my account, it's my responsibility to get him back into ship-shape!)
(But...how? What can I do to make him smile again?)
Was that you, Mym?
(Ugh, how embarrassing. Although now that I think about it...!)
Come with me, would you?
Okie-dokie, darling. Eat up!
This is so much food...
You can't expect to get your memories back without some fuel in the tank, silly.
You make a valid point. Time to eat, then.
Whoa... Delicious! This yakisoba is incredible!
Hee hee. There's that smile I love.
Huh?
I always see you beaming when you're eating with everyone, so I figured a good meal might put a little of the old pep back into your step.
This is so nice. Thank you, Mym. Say... Would you tell me about myself?
I'd like to know more about what kind of person I am.
Of course. Let's see... I'll start by talking about the time when I met you.
...That about sums it up. You were so cool back then, it made my heart positively throb!
I see. It's...kind of hard to believe.
Why do you say that?
Because you're talking about me like I'm this reliable, charismatic person.
Well, it's all true. Not one word of what I say is an exaggeration.
You're going to make me blush. But...
Even after listening to you, I still don't remember anything. I can't imagine I'm worth all your praise like this.
Oh, darling...
Sorry. You went out of your way to tell me all of this, and now it sounds like I'm trying to shut you down.
There's no need to rush.
Huh?
Like I told you, you've been a fighter all along. You've never given up.
And in the past, you've needed time off. Just think of this incident as a little summer vacation from your burdens.
You always put others first. So today, I only want you to think about you.
Mym...
Relax! We're all here with you!
I promise you that we're going to get your memories back.
I... Thank you. I'm really glad you're here.
(No, no, no... Come on, Mym! The poor boy is in a bona fide crisis. This is no time to go all weak in the knees.)
Hey, here's an idea: now that you're full, how about a walk on the beach?
Your memories might come back easier than we expect if you relax a bit.
Good thinking. Shall we, then?
(My hand... He's holding my hand! Deepbreathsdeepbreathsdeepbreaths—)
(Gah. Bad Mym! I refuse to be the kind of woman who lets her feelings run amok at a time like this!)
Ahhh... Bliss! Few things beat a nice walk on the beach.
I'm inclined to agree. The sound of the waves breaking on the shore is soothing.
Eeek!
Is everything all right?
Oh, er, I'm fine. That sudden wave just surprised me, that's all.
Are you afraid of the ocean, Mym?
Well, yes... A little. After what happened, I mean.
That's right, you almost drowned out there.
Come here. We'll keep a little more distance between us and the water's edge.
(Oh... He's pulling me by the hand again.)
(What should I do? My darling is grappling with the aftermath of his memory loss...)
(But I can't deny I'm thrilled to be the recipient of his undivided attention.)
What do you suppose is going on over there, Mym? A bunch of people seem to be making something.
Let's get a little closer and see!
Pardon me. May I ask what you're making?
Why, hello, stranger. This is a wishing crystal.
Hm. First I've heard of such a thing.
That so? It's a yearly tradition around these parts to float these crystals into the air.
And they say that once they're up and away, all the wishes in the crystal will come true! You're welcome to join in.
It sounds like a lovely event. Mym, should we try making a crystal, too?
No... It couldn't be...
...that my darling would have eyes only for me.
I... Thank you. I'm really glad you're here.
(But I can't deny I'm thrilled to be the recipient of his undivided attention.)
Could all of this be because of that wish?
Is something wrong, Mym? You don't look so good.
Oh, no, everything's fine! I just need to go powder my nose. Back in a flash!
Powder...her nose?
Heh. Don't think too hard about it, lad.
Hey, mister! We'll teach you how to make the crystals while you wait for your lady friend to come back!
That'd be great. Thank you.
Hey! Crystal faerie! Where are you?
Back so soon?
I'm guessing that since you came here, your wish came true.
Yeah, and now we're in a dilly of a pickle!
Hmmm... So your wish for the prince to ＂have eyes only for you＂ has caused him to have amnesia.
That's right. Because of me, my darling is—
So my crystals can grant dragon wishes too... This is an incredible discovery!
Huh? What do you mean?
Forgive me. I wasn't actually certain the crystal I gave you—a dragon—would work.
I know it could grant faerie wishes, but wasn't sure it would work for other races.
Are you telling me you hid that from me from the start?
You half-doubted it anyway, right? So that doesn't really count as tricking you.
Besides, what's there to be mad about? It worked. Everything's fine and dandy.
It is no such thing! I wouldn't have wished for this if I knew it'd be done so forcefully!
Tell me how to undo it.
But that'd be such a waste.
Didn't you get exactly what you wanted?
Not if it meant he got hurt in the process!
That's a pretty self-centered perspective.
Did you ever stop to think he might be HAPPIER without all his memories?
Oh, enough scowling already. I really don't think all this is as bad as you're making it out to be—for him OR you.
Just bear in mind that if the wish is undone, anything that happened while he was suffering from amnesia will be forgotten.
It...will?
Of course. It'll be like your wish never happened. Are you at peace with that?
Yes. I'd rather he went back to normal.
*sigh* Fine, then. Let it never be said that I leave my ＂customers＂ high and dry.
Here. One more crystal. Stand in front of your prince, wish for his memory to return, and you'll be golden.
That's all it'll take?
You yourself proved that my crystals work for dragons. But remember this:
It's not so easy for people to deny what lies in their hearts. Can you commit to negating your wish without hesitation?
Of course I can.
What splendid resolve. Now, it's about time I took my leave. Farewell to you, human-like dragon.
Yes... Now I can finally fix this mess.
Wait for me, darling. I'm coming!
I'm baaack!
Oh, Mym. You sure were gone awhile.
Sorry to keep you waiting.
It's okay. While you were out, the locals taught me how to make a wishing crystal. It came out rather nicely, don't you think?
I made one for you too, so what say we get them to float together tonight?
That is wonderfully sweet of you. Before we do that, though, we have something important to discuss.
Oh?
Get this: I've found a way to recover your lost memories!
Really?! What do I have to do?
You see...
Just bear in mind that if the wish is undone, anything that happened while he was suffering from amnesia will be forgotten.
Despite all I do to get his attention, it's like he's not even seeing me that way at all... Confidence...depleting...
I... Thank you. I'm really glad you're here.
It's just, um...
(If his memory comes back, his affection for others will return, too.)
(I told myself I was okay with that, for his sake, but...)
Talk to me, Mym. You don't look so good.
Oh, I-I'm sorry! Didn't mean to worry you. So, er, here's the thing—
I'm guessing that your method to get my memory back would cause you pain. If so, then you don't have to force it.
Huh...?
I don't want you to suffer on my account. Let's find another way.
But if we do that—
You know, I've been wondering all along why I only remember you.
At first, I thought it was just chance. It seems like I went under trying to save you, so I figured that's what it was.
But... I think there's a much bigger reason.
Meaning?
I'm thinking that maybe...it's because you were more important to me than anyone else.
Darling, that's—
Oh, but if I'm mistaken, I'm sorry! I don't mean to throw something like that out so casually and inadvertently hurt you.
No, no, not at all.
That's a relief. I don't know what our relationship was before I lost my memory, but...
Right now, you're incredibly important to me, Mym.
And by ＂important,＂ you mean...?
(What am I asking? Do I really need to have it spelled out for me?)
Would you be bothered if I said...that I could see us sharing a life together?
What...?
I've been a ball of anxiety ever since I lost my memories. But it was you who made me smile again, Mym.
And that made me think...that even if my memories never return, I'll be happy, so long as you're with me.
Darling...
Mym... You mean the world to me.
I feel kind of empty right now, but I just had to convey these feelings to you. I didn't want to leave them unsaid.
I don't want to see you in pain. If bringing my memories back would put you in a state of distress, then forget about it.
(Is this really happening?)
(Words of love from my darling... Not a dream, not some fevered delusion...)
(I've wanted to hear those words for so, so long. This is absolutely unreal.)
Did you ever stop to think he might be HAPPIER without all his memories?
(It's worth asking: would he really be happy if he got his memories back?)
(Robbed of his sister, his name disgraced, fighting with his real siblings...)
(And on top of all of that, his very existence denied... Wouldn't he despair at remembering all of that?)
(I could just take him away somewhere, to a place where there's no fighting.)
(He could live a peaceful life of solitude, free of his royal responsibilities, free from the burden of making dragonpacts...)
Mym... Will you tell me how you feel?
Darling, I...
(It's better like this. No regrets.)
Mym.
Yes?
I heard from the others about how you stuck with me while I was suffering from amnesia. Thank you.
It was no big deal. We just relaxed on the beach together.
Would you...tell me about what happened before my memories came back?
The whole incident is hazy to me, like a fleeting dream.
...No matter what's going on, you're always the same Euden.
Huh?
Ahem. Just talking to myself. Now, you wanted to know what happened? No sweat.
Let me think... First, we had some food at the cafe.
Your amnesia hit suddenly, and we were both very worried. I thought eating something good would cheer you up.
It feels like a waste to not remember what I ate.
Then we'll just have to go tomorrow and order it again. Anyway, after we ate, we went for a walk on the beach.
We came upon some locals making wishing crystals, and you joined in.
So that's what the crystal next to me was. They're supposed to float once they've been filled with wishes, right?
So why was mine left behind, lying inert?
Well...
Mym... Will you tell me how you feel?
Darling, I...
...I can't reciprocate your feelings.
You might well be happy if you stayed like this, swaddled in sweet oblivion.
If you wanted it, I could fly us both somewhere far away. It would be nice. But...
That would be to deny who you have been all along.
Mym...
Love is putting your beloved's feelings at the forefront. And that's why all my hesitation is gone now.
Let's get your memories back.
Wait, is that what I think it is?
Wishing crystal, grant me my wish.
Bring my darling's memories back!
Oh! He passed out.
Thank you, my love. It made me so happy to hear you confess your feelings for me.
...ym. Hello? Mym?
Huh? Oh, um... Where were we?
I asked why the crystal I made was left behind. Are...you okay, though? You suddenly spaced out.
I'm fine. I was just thinking back a bit. If I recall, when you went to raise the crystal into the air, you collapsed.
That's why it was left as it was. I was relieved that your memories were back when you awakened.
It sounds like you went to a lot of trouble for me. Thank you.
I did what anyone would do. You mean the world to me.
Ha ha! And you to me, Mym.
(I know he means he cares about me as a friend—a comrade.)
(I'm the one who chose for things to be like this. I'm fine with this...)
Mym... You mean the world to me.
(Come on, Mym, get it together! When he had lost his memory, he conveyed his feelings despite his unease.)
(I need to do the same thing and just say it. What is it that I desire? Don't let it end as nothing more than a wish!)
Hey, I know. Since we have it, let's go ahead and try to get this crystal to float.
That's all right. I have to make my wishes come true myself.
What do you mean?
Darling, I love you.
Huh?
And not in the way you care for me— like, as a friend.
I want to spend my life with you. I want to be your number one.
Can you say the same? Do you love me in a way that goes beyond the bounds of friend and comrade?
...I'm sorry. I can't answer that on the spot.
Maybe I'm not mature enough to understand what it means to be in love.
And honestly, right now... I can't think about it. I need to focus on me. Because if I can't love myself, how am I supposed to love somebody else?
And so long as my mind's a mire of half- considered thoughts and emotions, I don't think I can give your feelings the level of consideration they deserve. I'm sorry.
It's fine. I somehow knew that's where you'd be at with all of this.
But don't worry. I'm a dragon, after all!
And we dragons live a long time. I can wait patiently for your answer.
If you can give me an answer once you've done some growing and exploring in the realm of love, that's good enough for me.
Mym... Thank you.
And so, my darling— don't ever forget this summer.
I promise you I won't. No matter what happens.
Thank you.
(I'm not going to lose confidence ever again, so long as I remember the promise we made this summer.)
(I'll be waiting for you, darling. Always.)
